THIS DATSUN GO 1.2 MID IS ONE OF THE MOST PRACTICAL, FUEL EFFICIENT AND CONVENIENT VEHICLES THAT YOU CAN FIND. IT IS EASY TO GET AROUND THE CITY AND GET INTO TIGHT PARKING SPACES. ITS 1.2 LITRE ENGINE PRODUCES 50 KW OF POWER AND 104 NM OF TORQUE. IT HAS A TOP SPEED OF 161 KM/PH. IT HAS MANUFACTURERS' CLAIMED FUEL CONSUMPTION FIGURES OF 5.5 LITRES PER 100 KM. THIS IS THE PERFECT VEHICLE TO COMPLETE YOUR ERRANTS AS IT OFFERS GREAT FUEL EFFICIENCY. 

ALL PRE-OWNED VEHICLES UNDERGO A STRINGENT AA MULTI-POINT CHECK AND AA ROADWORTHY BEFORE DELIVERY. WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE AND IT GETS EVEN BETTER, WE COME TO YOU. FINANCE AVAILABLE AND A TEST DRIVE IS A MUST. PRICE EXCLUDES LICENSE REGISTRATION, ADMINISTRATION, DELIVERY, AND ON THE ROAD FEES. *ERRORS AND OMISSIONS EXCEPTED

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. Warranty valid till 29/09/2023
Last Service - 30/05/2022 Full Service History

The Nissan Qashqai 1.2T Visia was built to be reliable, sophisticated and comfortable and it certainly delivers on all of those promises. The strong 1.2 turbocharged engine pushes out 85kW power with a fuel economy of  6.2l/100km. Loaded with the latest technology which includes handsfree Bluetooth connectivity, multi-functioning steering, electronic handbrakes as well USB and Auxiliary jacks. The interior is adorned with full leather seats that is in pristine condition and electric windows for all of its passengers. It is not difficult to tell that this vehicle has been well taken care off by its previous owner. The boot has more than enough space with a whopping 430l to fit all your luggage. It also has lots of leg room for all of its passenger for a comfortable driving experience.  Book a test drive today!!!

Trade Ins Welcome. Finance Available.
Certified Roadworthy Pre-Owned.
